creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: stylized map on faux hide mounted to blue fabric covered board; several blue outlined cartouches with male and female figures inside dressed in different styles of clothing; one cartouche has a unicorn, and another has a lighthouse; crisscrossing lines in background, with ships, angels, a whale, and mermaids; small inscription in English characters LLQ
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on faux hide
title: Map in One's Mind
